title: Astral’s Outback and Solstice Rim Now Available in “Stealth” Finish
content:
Oregon-based wheel and component manufacturer Astral Cycling has released the latest of a series of limited-edition offerings. Two best-selling alloy rim profiles – the Outback and the Solstice – are currently offered in a matte dark grey finish the brand refers to as “Stealth,” a cerakote finish that was requested by SimWorks and Blue Lug in Japan.

The Outback is the company’s best-selling alloy gravel wheelset with a 25mm internal-width. The Solstice on the other hand is a classic box-section measuring 20mm internal designed for modern road riding applications. Rims sell for $169.00 and custom wheel builds are available on request.

The Stealth Grey Solstice and Outback are in stock and available now at Astral Cycling.

The post Astral’s Outback and Solstice Rim Now Available in “Stealth” Finish appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
